  <script type="text/javascript">
   var imagePosition = 1;
                 var imagePositionMin = 1;
                 var imagePositionMax = 5;
                 var slideshow_on = 0;
 
                 function refreshImage() {
                     t = setTimeout('refreshImage()', 6000);
                     swapImage()
                     slideshow_on = 1;
                 }
 
                 function startstoprefresh() {
                     if (slideshow_on == 1) {
                         clearTimeout(t);
                         slideshow_on = 0;
                         t = setTimeout('refreshImage()', 6000);
                         //document.getElementById('imagebtnplay').src = "images/homepage/pause.png";
                     }
                     else {
                         slideshow_on = 1;
                         t = setTimeout('refreshImage()', 6000);
                         //document.getElementById('imagebtnplay').src = "images/homepage/play2.png";
                     }
 
                 }
 
                 function swapImage(imageoverride) {
                     var beforeImagePosition = imagePosition;
 
                     //alert(imageoverride);
 
                     if (imageoverride == null) {
                         imagePosition++;
                         if (imagePosition > imagePositionMax) {
                             imagePosition = imagePositionMin;
                         }
                     }
                     else {
 
                         switch (imageoverride) {
                             case 'left':
                                 imagePosition--;
                                 if (imagePosition < imagePositionMin) {
                                     imagePosition = imagePositionMax;
                                 }
                                 slideshow_on = 1;
                                 startstoprefresh();
                                 break;
                             case 'right':
                                 imagePosition++;
                                 if (imagePosition > imagePositionMax) {
                                     imagePosition = imagePositionMin;
                                 }
                                 slideshow_on = 1;
                                 startstoprefresh();
                                 break;
 
                             default:
                                 imagePosition = imageoverride;
                                 slideshow_on = 1;
                                 startstoprefresh();
                         }
                     }
 
                     document.getElementById('imagebtn' + beforeImagePosition).src = "images/homepage/bullet1.jpg";
                     document.getElementById('imagebtn' + imagePosition).src = "images/homepage/bullet2.jpg";
                     $('#banner' + beforeImagePosition).fadeOut(1000);
                     $('#banner' + imagePosition).fadeIn(2000);
                 }
  </script>
